UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Five novel antimicrobial peptides from the Kuhl's wart frog skin secretions, Limnonectes kuhlii.
Literature.Author: Wang G, Wang Y, Ma D, Liu H, Li J, Zhang K, Yang X, Lai R, Liu J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592(MIC=10.0µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=15.0µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=40.0µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=10.0µg/ml),Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC=10.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=5.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=5.0µg/ml)
